lead_paragraph: MOORE--William Edward, of NYC, passed away on June 26, 2016, ending his quixotic quest to be the most cultured man alive. Bill's curiosity and charm was the basis for a career in sales and lively conversation. He is survived by his sons Eric and Jon, sister Randi and stepmother Peggy. Memorial will be July 24th in his home from 5-9pm. In lieu of flowers, buy and read a book. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MOORE, WILLIAM EDWARD
